태스크:
I want to simply save one YouTube video locally. Please develop code that can save the video from the following URL:
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=lvREMOIUpaE&list=RDlvREMOIUpaE&start_radio=1

{
  "summary": "youtube_downloader.py CLI 인자/프롬프트 입력 방식으로 변경 + requirements.txt 생성",
  "files_changed": [
    "youtube_downloader.py",
    "requirements.txt"
  ],
  "diff": "--- /dev/null
+++ b/youtube_downloader.py
@@ -0,0 +1,62 @@
+"""
+YouTube Video Downloader
+
+Requirements:
+    pip install -r requirements.txt
+
+Usage:
+    python youtube_downloader.py <URL>
+    python youtube_downloader.py  # (프롬프트로 URL 입력)
+"""
+
+import subprocess
+import sys
+import os
+
+
+def ensure_yt_dlp():
+    """yt-dlp가 설치되어 있는지 확인하고, 없으면 설치"""
+    try:
+        import yt_dlp
+    except ImportError:
+        print("yt-dlp not found. Installing...")
+        subprocess.check_call([sys.executable, "-m", "pip", "install", "yt-dlp"])
+
+
+def download_video(url: str, output_dir: str = "downloads"):
+    """YouTube 동영상 다운로드"""
+    ensure_yt_dlp()
+    import yt_dlp
+
+    os.makedirs(output_dir, exist_ok=True)
+
+    ydl_opts = {
+        'format': 'bestvideo[ext=mp4]+bestaudio[ext=m4a]/best[ext=mp4]/best',
+        'outtmpl': os.path.join(output_dir, '%(title)s.%(ext)s'),
+        'noplaylist': True,
+        'merge_output_format': 'mp4',
+    }
+
+    try:
+        with yt_dlp.YoutubeDL(ydl_opts) as ydl:
+            info = ydl.extract_info(url, download=True)
+            filename = ydl.prepare_filename(info)
+            print(f"Downloaded: {filename}")
+            return filename
+    except Exception as e:
+        print(f"Download failed: {e}")
+        return None
+
+
+if __name__ == "__main__":
+    if len(sys.argv) > 1:
+        video_url = sys.argv[1]
+    else:
+        video_url = input("Enter YouTube URL: ").strip()
+
+    if video_url:
+        result = download_video(video_url)
+        if result:
+            print(f"Video saved to: {result}")
+        else:
+            print("Download failed.")
+    else:
+        print("No URL provided.")
--- /dev/null
+++ b/requirements.txt
@@ -0,0 +1 @@
+yt-dlp",
  "todo_next": "pip install -r requirements.txt && python youtube_downloader.py <URL>"
}

코드:
{
  "summary": "youtube_downloader.py CLI 인자/프롬프트 입력 방식으로 변경 + requirements.txt 생성",
  "files_changed": [
    "youtube_downloader.py",
    "requirements.txt"
  ],
  "diff": "--- /dev/null
+++ b/youtube_downloader.py
@@ -0,0 +1,62 @@
+"""
+YouTube Video Downloader
+
+Requirements:
+    pip install -r requirements.txt
+
+Usage:
+    python youtube_downloader.py <URL>
+    python youtube_downloader.py  # (프롬프트로 URL 입력)
+"""
+
+import subprocess
+import sys
+import os
+
+
+def ensure_yt_dlp():
+    """yt-dlp가 설치되어 있는지 확인하고, 없으면 설치"""
+    try:
+        import yt_dlp
+    except ImportError:
+        print("yt-dlp not found. Installing...")
+        subprocess.check_call([sys.executable, "-m", "pip", "install", "yt-dlp"])
+
+
+def download_video(url: str, output_dir: str = "downloads"):
+    """YouTube 동영상 다운로드"""
+    ensure_yt_dlp()
+    import yt_dlp
+
+    os.makedirs(output_dir, exist_ok=True)
+
+    ydl_opts = {
+        'format': 'bestvideo[ext=mp4]+bestaudio[ext=m4a]/best[ext=mp4]/best',
+        'outtmpl': os.path.join(output_dir, '%(title)s.%(ext)s'),
+        'noplaylist': True,
+        'merge_output_format': 'mp4',
+    }
+
+    try:
+        with yt_dlp.YoutubeDL(ydl_opts) as ydl:
+            info = ydl.extract_info(url, download=True)
+            filename = ydl.prepare_filename(info)
+            print(f"Downloaded: {filename}")
+            return filename
+    except Exception as e:
+        print(f"Download failed: {e}")
+        return None
+
+
+if __name__ == "__main__":
+    if len(sys.argv) > 1:
+        video_url = sys.argv[1]
+    else:
+        video_url = input("Enter YouTube URL: ").strip()
+
+    if video_url:
+        result = download_video(video_url)
+        if result:
+            print(f"Video saved to: {result}")
+        else:
+            print("Download failed.")
+    else:
+        print("No URL provided.")
--- /dev/null
+++ b/requirements.txt
@@ -0,0 +1 @@
+yt-dlp",
  "todo_next": "pip install -r requirements.txt && python youtube_downloader.py <URL>"
}
